name: ReXtore
tagline: one stop shop for recovery, restoration and re-use of furniture, fixtures and equipment used across key industries such as Retail, F&B, Education and Hospitality
description: reXtore provides a collection service for unwanted items (subject to appraisal) and restores, re-sells, rents through our re-commerce marketplace. We also offer a sustainable design and build service for the retail, commercial, travel and hospitality sectors.

circular_economy: Collection service for unwanted items (subject to appraisal)
Restoration of furniture, fixtures and equipment

business_model: Re-commerce marketplace with collection, restoration, and redistribution
